### What are you trying to do?
_Explain what you're trying to achieve._

### What issues are you encountering?
_Describe any error messages, unexpected behavior, or confusion._

### What have you tried so far?
_List troubleshooting steps you’ve already taken (e.g., read docs, tried commands)._

### Additional Context
_Share anything else that may help us assist you better (server environment, steps, expectations)._
